dict.acceptation: 挑选，挑拣；挖，采，摘，剔，扒；挑剔；

sent.trans: 我们能把‘hiccups’同‘pick－ups’放在一起押韵吗？

sent.orig: A pick-me-up as one word is something that makes someone feel better or gives them energy.
sent.trans: “pick-me-up”合起来是一个词，表示“能让人振作起来、让人心情好起来的东西”。

sent.orig: Links: Pick Up Register, View Pick Up Request, Update Pick Up Status.
sent.trans: 链接：接机登记系统，查看登记信息，更改状态。

sent.orig: My grandpa's hands are picking vegetables from the garden. Pick, pick, pick.
sent.trans: 我的爷爷的手正在花园里采摘蔬菜。采摘，采摘，采摘。

sent.orig: Some women pick men to marry -- and others pick them to pieces.
sent.trans: 有些女人寻找可以嫁的男人，另一些女人则寻找可以被她们毁灭的男人。
